title: WTB: G-VG Brooklyn cards - any back
author: 4reals

posts.post_title: WTB: G-VG Brooklyn cards - any back
posts.post_content:
I'm slowly creeping into the T206 world. Not looking to make a big splash but would like to add to my Brooklyn collection by adding as many different variations as I can. Looking for cards in G-VG range. Creases okay but please no paper loss, alterings, or writing. I'm on a limited budget so if someone has a lot I may not be able to purchase all at once.

PM or email, thanks!

Joe
my Joe Dunn Brooklyn CB is listed in this t206 grouping. PSA 3
